title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 3433/93 of 15 December 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1102/89 laying down certain measures for implementing Council Regulation (EEC) No 1101/89 on structural improvements in inland waterway transport
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3433/93 of 15 December 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1102/89 laying down certain measures for implementing Council Regulation (EEC) No 1101/89 on structural improvements in inland waterway transport
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 1102/89 is hereby amended as follows:
1. the first indent in Article 10 (1) (a) is replaced by the following:
'- the funds' debts on 1 January of the previous year, plus or minus the compensatory amounts that the funds have received or paid respectively during that year in connection with the financial transfers referred to in paragraph 3 (Dn),';
2. the first indent in Article 10 (2) (a) is replaced by the following:
'- the total debts of all the funds on 1 January of the previous year (Dt), this amount being equal to the sum of the debts (Dn).'

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1993.
For the Commission
Abel MATUTES
Member of the Commission
